resources.string: Verifik Tutorial
What do you want to learn today?
Explore and test the logic of our services in a series of simple an easy tutorials
Change language
Biometric
Explore
Descripción
Parámetros
Criterios de éxito
Step 1
Step 2
Continuar tutorial
Llave secreta (JWT)
Comenzar
Liveness Check
Perform a liveness check in the user\s FaceScan in order to identify if the person is who they claim to be and if they are present at the time of validation
There are no parameters

1. The FaceScan came from a live human and was checked for vitality.\n 2. The session token was valid and not expired.\n 3. The parameters sent in the Body match those generated by the Project\'s SDK (Does not apply to the Demo).

Verifik is a platform that sells Verification, Authentication and Data Verification services. By combining all Verifik services you can have a complete solution. Create an account within https://verifik.co to start enjoying our services in an easy and simple way to integrate.

Go to your dashboard at https://app.verifik.co and you will find at the end of the page your private key (JWT) to copy, in it we have your necessary information to validate your permissions and available credits to use the logic in this tutorial.
Biometric Registration
Perform a lifeness check and if successful store the resulting 3D face map in the database.
externalDatabaseRefID: This parameter is a unique identifier which is to be associated to the the FaceScan performed. There is an option of email or telephone number.

1. The FaceScan came from a live human and was checked for vitality.
 2. The session token was valid and not expired.
 3. The parameters sent in the Body match those generated by the Project's SDK (Does not apply to the Demo).
 4. The parameter externalDatabaseRefID is not currently in the database.
 5. A new sessionId was used.

Verifik is a platform that sells Verification, Authentication and Data Verification services. By combining all Verifik services you can have a complete solution. Create an account within https://verifik.co to start enjoying our services in an easy and simple way to integrate.

Go to your dashboard at https://app.verifik.co and you will find at the end of the page your private key (JWT) to copy, in it we have your necessary information to validate your permissions and available credits to use the logic in this tutorial.
Biometrics Login
Process a lifeness check on a user and compare it with the it\'s previously stored FaceMap.
externalDatabaseRefID: This parameter is a unique identifier which is to be associated to the the FaceScan performed. There is an option of email or telephone number.

1. The FaceScan came from a live human and was checked for vitality.
 2. The session token was valid and not expired.
 3. The parameters sent in the Body match those generated by the Project's SDK (Does not apply to the Demo).
 4. The parameter externalDatabaseRefID is not currently in the database.
 5. A new sessionId was used.
 A new sessionId was used.

Verifik is a platform that sells Verification, Authentication and Data Verification services. By combining all Verifik services you can have a complete solution. Create an account within https://verifik.co to start enjoying our services in an easy and simple way to integrate.

Go to your dashboard at https://app.verifik.co and you will find at the end of the page your private key (JWT) to copy, in it we have your necessary information to validate your permissions and available credits to use the logic in this tutorial.
Match biometrics with ID
Compare your facescan with a government issues ID.
externalDatabaseRefID: This parameter is a unique identifier which is to be associated to the the FaceScan performed. There is an option of email or telephone number.

1. The FaceScan came from a live human and was checked for vitality.
 2. The session token was valid and not expired.
 3. The parameters sent in the Body match those generated by the Project's SDK (Does not apply to the Demo).
 4. The parameter externalDatabaseRefID is not currently in the database.
 5. A new sessionId was used, in this case the same sessionId can be used for two services

OCR & ID Scan
Process OCR after an ID scan. Only compatible with Device SDK ID scan session.
There are no parameters

The scanned document is real and matches the country or selected service .\n The session token was valid and not expired.\n The parameters sent in the Body match those generated by the Project\'s SDK (Does not apply to the Demo).

Verifik is a platform that sells Verification, Authentication and Data Verification services. By combining all Verifik services you can have a complete solution. Create an account within https://verifik.co to start enjoying our services in an easy and simple way to integrate.

Go to your dashboard at https://app.verifik.co and you will find at the end of the page your private key (JWT) to copy, in it we have your necessary information to validate your permissions and available credits to use the logic in this tutorial.
Image Age Estimator
Obtain an age estimate of a human image
image: This parameter is a base64 image.
1. The FaceScan came from a live human and was checked for vitality.\n 2. The parameters sent in the Body are as required

Verifik is a platform that sells Verification, Authentication and Data Verification services. By combining all Verifik services you can have a complete solution. Create an account within https://verifik.co to start enjoying our services in an easy and simple way to integrate.

Image Liveness Detection
Detect liveness or humanity off an image.
image: This parameter is a base64 image.
1. The FaceScan came from a live human and was checked for vitality.\n 2. The parameters sent in the Body are as required

Verifik is a platform that sells Verification, Authentication and Data Verification services. By combining all Verifik services you can have a complete solution. Create an account within https://verifik.co to start enjoying our services in an easy and simple way to integrate.

Go to your dashboard at https://app.verifik.co and you will find at the end of the page your private key (JWT) to copy, in it we have your necessary information to validate your permissions and available credits to use the logic in this tutorial.
2D Image Matching
Compare the biometric data of two 2D images
minMatchLevel: This parameter is a number from 1 to 6, this number indicates the minimum match between images, 6 being the highest.\n image0: base64 image of face 1.\n image1: base64 image of face 2.
1. The FaceScan came from a live human and was checked for vitality.\n 2. The parameters sent in the Body are as required

Age Estimation
Estimate age from a biometric record (FaceScan)
externalDatabaseRefID: This parameter is a unique identifier which is to be associated to the the FaceScan performed. There is an option of email or telephone number.
1. The FaceScan came from a live human and was checked for vitality.\n 2. The parameters sent in the Body are as required

Verifik is a platform that sells Verification, Authentication and Data Verification services. By combining all Verifik services you can have a complete solution. Create an account within https://verifik.co to start enjoying our services in an easy and simple way to integrate.

Compare FaceScan with an image
Compare the biometric FaceScan with a 2D image.

externalDatabaseRefID: This parameter is a unique identifier which is to be associated to the the FaceScan performed. There is an option of email or telephone number.\n minMatchLevel: This parameter is a number from 1 to 6, this number indicates the minimum match between images, 6 being the highest.\n image: This parameter is a base64 image of the face.
1. The FaceScan came from a live human and was checked for vitality\n 2. The parameters sent in the Body are as required.
